1: שִׁ֗יר <sup>7892 </sup> <n>A Song</n> לַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <sup>4609 </sup> <n>of degrees</n> אֶשָּׂ֣א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>I will lift up</n> עֵ֭ינַי <sup>5869 </sup> <n>mine eyes</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הֶהָרִ֑ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>unto the hills</n> מֵ֝אַ֗יִן <sup>370 </sup> <n>from whence</n> יָבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>cometh</n> עֶזְרִֽי׃ <sup>5828 </sup> <n>my help</n>
2: עֶ֭זְרִי <sup>5828 </sup> <n>My help</n> מֵעִ֣ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>from</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[cometh] from the LORD</n> עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which made</n> שָׁמַ֥יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>heaven</n> וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and earth</n>
3: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> יִתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>He will not suffer</n> לַמּ֣וֹט <sup>4132 </sup> <n>to be moved</n> רַגְלֶ֑ךָ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>thy foot</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יָ֝נ֗וּם <sup>5123 </sup> <n>thee will not slumber</n> שֹֽׁמְרֶֽךָ׃ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>he that keepeth</n>
4: הִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will neither</n> יָ֭נוּם <sup>5123 </sup> <n>shall neither slumber</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יִישָׁ֑ן <sup>3462 </sup> <n>nor sleep</n> שׁ֝וֹמֵ֗ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Behold he that keepeth</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n>
5: יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> שֹׁמְרֶ֑ךָ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>[is] thy keeper</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צִ֝לְּךָ֗ <sup>6738 </sup> <n>[is] thy shade</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יַ֥ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hand</n> יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>upon thy right</n>
6: יוֹמָ֗ם <sup>3119 </sup> <n>thee by day</n> הַשֶּׁ֥מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>The sun</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יַכֶּ֗כָּה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>shall not smite</n> וְיָרֵ֥חַ <sup>3394 </sup> <n>nor the moon</n> בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃ <sup>3915 </sup> <n>by night</n>
7: יְֽהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> יִשְׁמָרְךָ֥ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>shall preserve</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> רָ֑ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>thee from all evil</n> יִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>he shall preserve</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>thy soul</n>
8: יְֽהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> יִשְׁמָר־ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>shall preserve</n> צֵאתְךָ֥ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>thy going out</n> וּבוֹאֶ֑ךָ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and thy coming in</n> מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>this</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>from this time forth and even for</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>evermore</n>
